title: Coinbase Stock Keeps Sliding After Earnings Report
sub_head: The largest U.S. crypto exchange posts loss, says number of users is declining
body:
Shares of Coinbase Global Inc. slid after hours Tuesday as the company reported a loss and said its users declined from the previous quarter.
The stock fell 15% in late trading, after retreating 12% during the regular session. It is off by more than 70% so far this year.
